siteInfo.title: MP's Official Website
siteInfo.description: Welcome to my website. Here you can see all the projects I've worked on, some information about me and how to contact me. Enjoy your stay!
siteInfo.metaDescription: This is MentoskaPraha's official website. Here you can view all the information about him you need, such as his social media accounts or the projects he's worked on.

about.metaDescription: This is the about page of MentoskaPraha's official website. Here you can view all the information about him you need, such as his social media accounts and who he is.

projects.metaDescription: This is the projects page of MentoskaPraha's official website. Here you can view all the information about all of his projects.

basicInfo.description:
My name is: MentoskaPraha
I speak: English, French and Czech
My time zone is: GMT+2

A little bit more about me:

I'm an amateur programmer and average gamer. I almost always work on websites or API applications, but I do occasionally work on games not related to the web in any way. I like to play video games with my friends and we most commonly play game Sea of Thieves or Minecraft.

socialMedia.title: Github
socialMedia.description: My Github page. Here you can see all my repos.

socialMedia.title: Discord
socialMedia.description: If you want to contact me via Discord, join this server.

socialMedia.title: Coming Soon!
socialMedia.description: This social media account is still in the works.

tech.title: VS-Code
tech.description: Visual Studio Code is a light weight Integrated Development Environment, which I use to write my all of my code.

tech.title: Github
tech.description: Github is a source control tool, which is an extension of Git. I use this to ensure my code is up to date everywhere.

tech.title: Firebase
tech.description: Firebase is a cloud service from Google that allows for hosting serverless apps. I use it to deploy my projects.

tech.title: Node.js
tech.description: Node.js is a back-end runtime used to execute Javascript on a server. I use this for apps like the Big Chungus Bot.

tech.title: Typescript
tech.description: Typescript is a Javascript addon that adds type safety to Javascript. I always use this as it's better Javascript.

tech.title: Sveltekit
tech.description: Sveltekit is a framework used for making websites or GUIs. I used this framework to create this website.

tech.title: Tailwind CSS
tech.description: Tailwind CSS is a CSS utility for making website styling easier by adding pre-made CSS classes to aid with styling.

tech.title: MongoDB
tech.description: MongoDB is a document based database used to store user data. I use MongoDB for Big Chungus Bot.

list.title: MP's Website
list.description: This website is my personal website. I use it to display the things I've worked on. The website is made using Vue.js for the client and is deployed using Firebase, which is a free world wide developer platform by Google.

list.title: Big Chungus Bot
list.description: Big Chungus Bot is a API application for Discord build with Discord.js, Typescript and MongoDB. He's a general purpose Discord bot that can give users custom colors, roll dice and much more. You can check him out on Github or try him out to find out more.

legal.privacy_policy: This website uses no cookie set by the creator. Your activity on this page is not monitored or tracked by the creator. The creator is not responsible for cookies managed by 3rd party services, such as Youtube or others.
legal.copyright: This website was made by MentoskaPraha using VSCode, Github and other tools. All static image sources can be found in the README.md file on Github. This website is published under the GNU General Public License V3.
